name: ucs-solo
long_description:
Description
===========

A cookbook to deploy and configure Cisco UCS. The cookbook leverages ucslib and helps setup
a basic Cisco UCS deployment.


Requirements
============



Attributes
==========

Usage
=====

Edit /etc/chef/node.json

{
"run_list" : ["recipe[ucs::basic]"]
}

Edit /etc/chef/solo.rb

cookbook_path "<path>"

file_cache_path "/var/chef-solo" #Default
role_path "/var/chef-solo/roles" #Default
data_bag_path "/var/chef-solo/data_bags" #Default
cookbook_path ["/var/chef-solo/cookbooks", "/var/chef-solo/my-cookbooks"] #Not default
json_attribs "/var/chef/node.json" #Also not default

ToDo
====

1. Move authentication info to encrypted Data Bags. Currently uses attributes.
